divs: Sighting DetailsI saw the Tinley Park Lights (3 lights) the second time around, then a few day later I saw only two lights slowly fly over head. I could not see the stars in-between the lights. It seemed big. I have never reported this before because I don't know the exact date or time. I am a smoker, and in trying to quit, I only smoked outside - and that is when I saw it. The sighting was after the well known Tinley lights I am now watching on TV. I can't tell you how big the lights were across, or why I could only see two lights. I do know that they were Not flares on balloons or an airplane, chopper or other aircraft flying "insync" with each other.
trends: There have been 15 other sightings in Tinley Park
There were no other sightings in Tinley Park on or around October 31st 2005
